alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Luna County through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carzalia Valley, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carzalia Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
